nodes.title: Meteor: a better way to use meteor npm command
nodes.excerpt: Meteor advice to run  meteor npm ...  instead of  npm ... . Using the  meteor npm ...  commands in place of traditional  npm ...  commands…
nodes.description: Did you forget to add meteor command before npm? Try adding a bash script that will make sure you always run it correctly.

nodes.title: Commitlint: custom commit message with emojis
nodes.excerpt: Commitlint@16.0.2  is the next step on enforcing rules in your JS project after eslint. Installation and configuration is very simple…
nodes.description: A guide to customize the commitlint to your need and use it as convention in your git repository. Customize commitlint header format to use emojis.
